headline: Can Coinbase’s Rally Continue After White House Opens 401k Access to Crypto?
summary: Trying to make a call on Coinbase Global is not for the faint of heart, but it is fascinating. If you have been tracking COIN over the past year, you have witnessed a stock that seems determined to prove skeptics wrong, surging an impressive 110.5% in the past twelve months and a staggering 374.4% over three years. Returns like these naturally get investors wondering whether the rally can continue, or if it is time to lock in gains and move on. Recent developments give even seasoned crypto...

headline: Psychedelics Without the Trip? Heavyweights Like Neuralink, Coinbase, Twitch Back AI Startup Developing 'Least Psychedelic Psychedelic' Drug
summary: Mindstate Design Labs is developing drugs that aim to deliver psychedelic benefits without a trip, drawing funding from Y Combinator and the founders of OpenAI, Neuralink, Instacart (NASDAQ:CART), Coinbase (NASDAQ:COIN), and Twitch, according to Wired. headline: Trending Stocks: Samsung, SK Hynix, Alibaba, and crypto
summary: SK Hynix (000660.KS) and Samsung (005930.KS) shares rose after announcing partnerships with OpenAI (OPAI.PVT) to build data centers in South Korea. Analysts at JPMorgan increased their price target on Alibaba (9988.HK) citing an improved cloud-revenue outlook and growing synergy between its AI and e-commerce operations. Meanwhile, crypto stocks, like Coinbase (COIN), Robinhood (HOOD) and Strategy (MSTR), rose as bitcoin (BTC-USD) continued to climb as the government shutdown entered its second day.

headline: Coinbase: Intl Expansion Focuses on EU, UAE, Singapore
